attributes.action: Stop mass immigration and stop the spread of illegal immigration in the UK
attributes.background: Parliament needs to start addressing the mass immigration issue and fix the problem not just letting anyone in because it’s ’not nice’ when we should send them back to their country as we aren’t mass immigrating to their countries are we.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Review UK immigration policies, including a cap the number of people arriving
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706038

Publish a detailed plan to tackle illegal migration and stop boat crossings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709678

Close the borders! Suspend ALL immigration for 5 years!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700824
